# Parts of the Camera

## The Focus Stick (Focus Lever)

Tilt or press the focus stick to select the focus area. The focus stick can also be used to navigate the menus.

!Focus Stick

> ðŸ’¡ **Tip:**  
> To choose the role played by the focus stick, press and hold the center of the stick or use **BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > FOCUS LEVER SETTING** (page 224).

## The DRIVE/DELETE Button

Pressing the **DRIVE/DELETE** button displays the drive-mode menu, where you can choose from the following drive modes.

!Drive/Delete Button

| Mode                | Page |
|---------------------|------|
| Single frame        | 42   |
| High-speed burst    | 92   |
| Low-speed burst     | 92   |
| ISO BKT             | 88   |
| WHITE BALANCE BKT   | 88   |
| Bracketing          | 89   |
| HDR                 | 93   |
| Adv. MODE           |      |
| â€¢ Panorama          | 95   |
| â€¢ Multiple Exposure | 98   |
| Filter              | 100  |
| Movie               | 48   |
